data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.

requestBody.title: Owner validates financial/reporting outputs API Trace

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Delivery state lifecycle (pending, sent, delivered, failed, read, cancelled)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Seat-Map Booking with Hold Timer. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
